Description: Dyno Nobel Inc., has agreed to pay a $257,167 civil penalty to settle alleged violations of the Clean Air Act (CAA), Emergency Planning and Community Right-to-Know Act (EPCRA), and the Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation, and Liability Act (CERCLA) at its facilities in the cities of Louisiana and Carthage, Mo.
Info Source: https://archive.epa.gov/epapages/newsroom_archive/newsreleases/bb8f7f53a92100f685257c08005ddd86.html

Description: Australia-based Dyno Nobel, Inc has agreed to settle a series of alleged violations of the Clean Air Act at the company's Cheyenne plant for $110,900.
Info Source: https://archive.epa.gov/epapages/newsroom_archive/newsreleases/a8f5ecb84ef0740d852578ca0073d5d5.html
